<a id="AudioBusLayout"></a>

# AudioBusLayout

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Stores information about the audio buses.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Stores position, muting, solo, bypass, effects, effect position, volume, and the connections between buses. See [AudioServer](AudioServer.md) for usage.
